content: Gorsuch is a mainstream, highly respected Judge who has received nothing but respect for his consistent and balanced mind. Yes he leans Conservative, just like Obama’s pick leaned Liberal. This selection simply establishes the stand of the courts as it was before the untimely death of Scalia. It was Joe Biden who originally said Presidents should not make supreme court replacements in election years. And it was Obama who said right after his first election that elections have consequences, and he won. Well Trump won, stop crying.
